bill.summary: 10/27/1987--Passed House amended. (Measure passed House, amended) Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives: (1) supporting a resolution of the present political crisis in Fiji which preserves parliamentary constitutional democracy and recognizes the rights of all people; and (2) opposing any unilateral action to solve the present political crisis in Fiji which is not representative of all the peoples of Fiji.
